pages.text: You're ready to create your first crystal, a base crystal. It won't do much, however, as it has no potential. It's simply just a crystal in the right shape to be the most efficient.
The base crystal can be made with some water, a $(l:arcana/crystal_base)crystal base$(/l), and some $(l:arcana/arcanum_minerale)arcanum minerale$(/l). However, it won't have much potential yet.
